Call to the Moon.name: Call to the Moon
Call to the Moon.flavor: A bloodcurdling howl escapes from your throat, announcing that the hunt has begun.
Call to the Moon.attack:
Wisdom + 4 vs. Will
Level 21: Wisdom + 6 vs. Will
Call to the Moon.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Unleash the Silent Predator.name: Unleash the Silent Predator
Unleash the Silent Predator.flavor: Your body contorts as you transform into the creature lurking inside you.
Unleash the Silent Predator.effect: You assume the form of a gray wolf or a tiger of your size until the end of the encounter, until you fall unconscious, or until you drop to 0 hit points or fewer. In this form, you add your Wisdom modifier to your speed. In addition, whenever you walk as a move action, you can shift 1 square as a free action before doing so.

Circle the Prey.name: Circle the Prey
Circle the Prey.flavor: You stalk around your enemy, searching for an opening to make a killing blow.
Circle the Prey.onHit: 3[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). In addition, you knock the target prone.
Circle the Prey.effect: Before or after the attack, you shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. After the attack, the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Circle the Prey.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength or Dexterity as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.
